with_embeddings:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX cdio: <https://w3id.org/CDIO/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?study ?label
WHERE {
  ?study rdf:type cdio:observational_study .
  ?study rdfs:label ?label .
  ?study cdio:about ?disease .
  FILTER(?disease IN (<https://w3id.org/CDIO/time-chf/angina>,
                      <https://w3id.org/CDIO/time-chf/angina1>,
                      <https://w3id.org/CDIO/time-chf/angina3>,
                      <https://w3id.org/CDIO/time-chf/angina6>))
}
